TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Localization extends System.Object
public ref class Localization abstract sealed

summary.span: 类为本地化特性和注释定义附加属性。

span.span: The class defines attached properties for localization attributes and comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记作者可能有特定要求中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]UI，例如文本长度、 字体系列或字体大小的约束。Markup authors may have specific requirements for elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] UI, such as constraints for text length, font family, or font size. 本地化人员需要知道有关它们的信息，以便提供一致的本地化。Localizers need to know about them in order to provide consistent localization. 可以在内指定本地化属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，从而允许作者为其本地化需求告知本地化人员。Localization properties can be specified inside [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], allowing authors to communicate their localization needs to localizers. 这些属性提供本地化，可用来修改应用程序的规则和提示。These properties provide rules and hints for localization, which can be used to modify the application. 有两种类型的本地化属性：There are two types of localization properties: - 本地化属性。Localization attributes. 属性所指定的资源，如，要进行本地化。The attributes specify which resources, such as , are to be localized. - 本地化注释。Localization comments. 注释是标记作者包含的自由格式文本。The comments are free-form text that the markup author includes. 有关如何使用这些本地化属性的详细信息，请参阅[本地化属性和注释](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to use these localization properties, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示本地化属性定义和注释的文本块。The following code example shows localization attributes and comments defined for a text block. [!code-xaml[AttributesSnippets#AttributesSnippet4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AttributesSnippets/CSharp/Comments.xaml#attributessnippet4)]

.field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty CommentsProperty

public: static initonly System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ CommentsProperty;

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取和设置附加属性的文本块。The following code example shows how to get and set the attached property for a text block.

param.span: 一个 ，表示要检索其附加属性的元素。

summary.span: 从指定元素获取 附加属性的值。

returns.span: 一个 值，表示本地化特性。

span.span: A value that represents the localization attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地化属性指定要进行本地化的资源。Localization attributes specify which resources are to be localized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检索为按钮定义本地化属性。The following code example shows how to retrieve the localization attributes defined for a button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地化属性指定要进行本地化的资源。Localization attributes specify which resources are to be localized. 有关如何定义本地化属性的详细信息，请参阅[本地化属性和注释](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to define localization attributes, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置按钮的本地化属性。The following code example shows how to set the localization attributes for a button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地化注释是应用程序开发人员包含的自由格式文本。Localization comments are free-form text that the application developer includes. 有关如何定义本地化注释的详细信息，请参阅[本地化属性和注释](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md)。For more information on how to define localization comments, see [Localization Attributes and Comments](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/localization-attributes-and-comments.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置文本块的本地化注释。The following code example shows how to set the localization comments for a text block.
